application.doc: Update an existing API Access Control Policy

param.name: policy_name
param.doc: The name of the API Access Control Policy.

method.name: PUT
method.id: Update an existing API Access Control Policy
method.doc: To update an existing API Access Control Policy with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP PUT command on the API Access Control policy resource URI.
Note that prior to running this web service the Verify Access administrator credential must be stored using the Store the Verify Access administrator credentials web service.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: groups
param.doc: The groups referenced by this policy. User must be a member of at least one group for this policy to be authorised. The default is no groups if not specified.

param.name: attributes
param.doc: The attribute matches referenced by this policy. Each attribute must be matched for this policy to be authorised. The default is no attributes if not specified.
